page.title: 16Getting up in the morning P1
page.content: I half wake up and open the curtains. An instinct tells me that the house isn't properly alive. By this time i'm fully awake. Now I play golf with an old cricket bat, a tennis ball and a table leg as the hole. I go into Mum and Dads room. Mum is lying in bed awake. I'm tired and instead of going back to my bed I go into Mums and Dads double bed because it is more comfy. Dad is downstairs washing up the coffee mugs. I went downstairs and got a breakfast of start breakfast cereal. Mum came downstairs. I droped a little bitnofnstart andbasked the dog if she wanted any. Mum said Jenny had been at a meat pie and two bins in the night. I decided not to give Jenny the Start as she was naughty. After finishing breakfast I got dressed. Mum went on a walk with the dog and by the time she was back I was ready.
